channel.title: Comments on: Version 1.18.0
channel.description: Brings your projects to your pocket

item.title: By: Valerio Mazzeo
item.dc:creator: Valerio Mazzeo
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../index.html#comment-89">Ioannis Kappas</a>.
Thanks for the heads up! It's already fixed and it will be released with 1.18.1.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ioannis Kappas.

Thanks for the heads up! It’s already fixed and it will be released with 1.18.1.

item.title: By: Ioannis Kappas
item.dc:creator: Ioannis Kappas
item.description:
Thanks for this great app.
There is a bug on the settings page that prohibits the selection of the syntax highlighter theme.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for this great app.

There is a bug on the settings page that prohibits the selection of the syntax highlighter theme.
